channel.title: Motivation on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on mattischrome

item.title: Doing the thing
item.description: I find it hard to get started on projects. This may have always been the case. I definitely remember instances of complex plans for school projects that I’d barely have time to finish. I once got up at 6AM to finish making a calendar in Frenchâ€”I thought it was going to be this outstanding piece of work that would genuinely replace my teacher’s calendar! Reality didn’t quite match the idea though.
